sk1.name: Spirit Lance
sk1.desc: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.

sk2.name: Doppelwalk
sk2.desc: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.

sk3.name: Juxtapose
sk3.desc: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies. Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.

sk4.name: Phantom Edge
sk4.desc: Phantom Lancer hones his abilities. Improves chance of Juxtaposing, and the Juxtapose illusions can now create their own illusions. Phantom Edge also increases Phantom Lancer's magic resistance.
